verses.verse: And thou, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, take<WH3947> thee a sharp<WH2299> knife<WH2719>, take<WH3947> thee a barber's<WH1532> rasor<WH8593>, and cause it to pass<WH5674> upon thine head<WH7218> and upon thy beard<WH2206>: then take<WH3947> thee balances<WH3976> to weigh<WH4948>, and divide<WH2505> the hair.

Thou shalt burn<WH1197> with fire<WH217> a third part<WH7992> in the midst<WH8432> of the city<WH5892>, when the days<WH3117> of the siege<WH4692> are fulfilled<WH4390>: and thou shalt take<WH3947> a third part<WH7992>, and smite<WH5221> about<WH5439> it with a knife<WH2719>: and a third part<WH7992> thou shalt scatter<WH2219> in the wind<WH7307>; and I will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after<WH310> them.

¶ Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; This is Jerusalem<WH3389>: I have set<WH7760> it in the midst<WH8432> of the nations<WH1471> and countries<WH776> that are round about<WH5439> her.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Because ye multiplied<WH1995> more than the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you, and have not walked<WH1980> in my statutes<WH2708>, neither have kept<WH6213> my judgments<WH4941>, neither have done<WH6213> according to the judgments<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you;

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I, even I, am against thee, and will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH4941> in the midst<WH8432> of thee in the sight<WH5869> of the nations<WH1471>.
And I will do<WH6213> in thee that which I have not done<WH6213>, and whereunto I will not do<WH6213> any more the like, because<WH3282> of all thine abominations<WH8441>.

Therefore the fathers<WH1> shall eat<WH398> the sons<WH1121> in the midst<WH8432> of thee, and the sons<WH1121> shall eat<WH398> their fathers<WH1>; and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in thee, and the whole remnant<WH7611> of thee will I scatter<WH2219> into all the winds<WH7307>.

Wherefore, as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Surely, because thou hast defiled<WH2930> my sanctuary<WH4720> with all thy detestable things<WH8251>, and with all thine abominations<WH8441>, therefore will I also diminish<WH1639> thee; neither shall mine eye<WH5869> spare<WH2347>, neither will I have any pity<WH2550>.

¶ A third part<WH7992> of thee shall die<WH4191> with the pestilence<WH1698>, and with famine<WH7458> shall they be consumed<WH3615> in the midst<WH8432> of thee: and a third part<WH7992> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> round about<WH5439> thee; and I will scatter<WH2219> a third part<WH7992> into all the winds<WH7307>, and I will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after<WH310> them.

Thus shall mine anger<WH639> be accomplished<WH3615>, and I will cause my fury<WH2534> to rest<WH5117> upon them, and I will be comforted<WH5162>: and they shall know<WH3045> that I the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it in my zeal<WH7068>, when I have accomplished<WH3615> my fury<WH2534> in them.
Moreover I will make<WH5414> thee waste<WH2723>, and a reproach<WH2781> among the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> thee, in the sight<WH5869> of all that pass by<WH5674>.

When I shall send<WH7971> upon them the evil<WH7451> arrows<WH2671> of famine<WH7458>, which shall be for their destruction<WH4889>, and which I will send<WH7971> to destroy<WH7843> you: and I will increase<WH3254> the famine<WH7458> upon you, and will break<WH7665> your staff<WH4294> of bread<WH3899>:
